member.name: T:MyFinance.WebApi.Filters.ExceptionFilters.BadRequestExceptionFilter
member.summary: BadRequest Exception filter. It handles ArgumentException or ArgumentNullException and send response with 400 status code.
member.remarks: Use it as an action attribute.

member.name: T:MyFinance.WebApi.Filters.ExceptionFilters.ConflictOnCreationExceptionFilter
member.summary: Conflict Exception filter. It handles ArgumentException and send response with 400 status code.
member.remarks: Use it as an action attribute.

member.name: T:MyFinance.WebApi.Filters.ExceptionFilters.InternalServerErrorFilter
member.summary: Root Exception filter. It handles all unhandled exceptions and send response with 500 status code.
member.remarks: Use it as an controller attribute.

member.name: T:MyFinance.WebApi.Filters.ExceptionFilters.NotFoundExceptionFilter
member.summary: NotFound Exception filter. It handles ArgumentException and send response with 404 status code.
member.remarks: Use it as an action attribute.
